message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the opportunity, but I can only pay up to $85 for the product.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. I can do a bit better than that. I'm willing to sell it to you for $92.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. However, I still can't go above $85 for the product.
